title.rendered: Podcast #44 – Cult of Luna, Black Country New Road, Erik Urano, Arca, Celeste, Author & Punisher

content.rendered:
Nuevo podcast en los que analizamos los primeros discos que hemos escuchado este año, que no son pocos. Hablamos de los siguientes:

  • Celeste – Asassine(s)
  • Cult Of Luna – The Long Road North
  • Ethereal Shroud – Trisagion
  • Rolo Tomassi – Where Myth Becomes Memory
  • Toundra – Hex
  • Ustalost – Before the glinting spell unvests
  • The Body – Enemy of Love
  • Zeal and Ardor – Zeal and Ardor
  • Ode and Elegy – Ode and Elegy
  • Erik Urano – Qubits
  • Boy Harsher – The Runner Soundtrack
  • Alice Glass – Prey IV
  • Arca – Kick ii / iii / iiii / iiiii
  • Author & Punisher – Krüller
  • Üverdriver – Gotele bricks
  • yeule – Glitch Princess
  • Pinegrove – 11:11
  • El último vecino – Juro y prometo
  • Animal Collective – Time Skiffs
  • Black Country, New Road – Ants From Up There
  • Godspeed You! Black Emperor – All Lights Fucked on the Hairy Amp Drooling
  • Los Planetas – Las canciones del agua
  • Mizmor – Wit’s End
  • Burial – Antidawn
